page.title: 13FARMS C.S.P.
page.content: C.S.P. stands for Cambridgeshire Salad Producers. It is supplied with lettuce by 30 local fulltime growers, who live on the Estate (now privately owned). CSP sells lettuce (6 million boxes per annum), celery (216,000) & tomatoes (264,000). These are produced in about 22 acres of glasshouses. The worst time for CSP is when there is a good harvest as the price goes down & makes it harder to sell. Modern facilities like vacuum coolers and insulation in transport are used to that even on the hottest days lettuce & other produce is chilled. Major supermarkets are regularly supplied by CSP, eg. Sains- bury's, International, Gateway, Budgens, Bishops, Key Markets & London Co-ops. These markets supply the foll- owing areas where smaller shopkeepers come & buy: London, East Anglia, Cardiff, Birmingham & Leicester.
